title: How to Do a Breaststroke Start

steps.headline: Push off the wall.
steps.description: Push off deep under the water. (Aim for a depth of about 1 meter for best results.) You can also dive in the pool for this step.

steps.headline: Assume a streamlined position with your hands out in front.
steps.description: Make sure you are looking straight down at the bottom of the pool. In your head, count to 3.

steps.headline: As soon as you hit 3, pull your arms down all the way down to your thighs and do 1 dolphin kick at the same time.
steps.description: Remember to keep looking at the bottom at the pool. In your head, count to 2.

steps.headline: Perform 1 whip kick (breaststroke kick).
steps.description: As you do this, also push your hands out in front. In your head, count to 1.

steps.headline: Rise to the surface of the water using your arms.

text: Push off the wall. Push off deep under the water. (Aim for a depth of about 1 meter for best results.) You can also dive in the pool for this step. Assume a streamlined position with your hands out in front. Make sure you are looking straight down at the bottom of the pool. In your head, count to 3. As soon as you hit 3, pull your arms down all the way down to your thighs and do 1 dolphin kick at the same time. Remember to keep looking at the bottom at the pool. In your head, count to 2. Perform 1 whip kick (breaststroke kick). As you do this, also push your hands out in front. In your head, count to 1. Rise to the surface of the water using your arms.  Start swimming normal breaststroke.
sentences: Push off deep under the water.
(Aim for a depth of about 1 meter for best results.)
You can also dive in the pool for this step.
Assume a streamlined position with your hands out in front.
Make sure you are looking straight down at the bottom of the pool.
As soon as you hit 3, pull your arms down all the way down to your thighs and do 1 dolphin kick at the same time.
Remember to keep looking at the bottom at the pool.
As you do this, also push your hands out in front.
Rise to the surface of the water using your arms.
